about_the_game:
With the Spider Expansion, you can prey on innocent victims as you transform into the exclusive Spider Terror form! Bringing you a unique playable terror with its new ability: Webshot.

Webshot shoots a web from the Spider's mouth, attaching to any player or structure in its way, and pulling one towards the other. Stop innocents in their tracks, or use this ability to gain quick ground, locking innocents within your sights.

As well as this, when you unlock the Spider, Werewolf and Vampire DLCs you will also gain access to an exclusive legendary melee weapon called the Wakizashi!

On top of that, the Spider pack includes an exclusive Spider Emblem, 3 loot booth tokens to help you get even more cosmetic gear for your character and 200 Credits to put towards your next item or use with the Reputation system to show appreciation to your favourite fellow players.

This pack contains:
  • Exclusive: Playable Spider Terror
  • Exclusive: ‘Cobweb’ T-shirt
  • Exclusive: Newspaper Melee Weapon
  • Exclusive: Spider Emblem
  • 3 Loot Booth Tokens
  • 200 Credits

Webshot shoots a web from the Spider's mouth, attaching to any player or structure in its way, and pulling one towards the other. Stop innocents in their tracks, or use this ability to gain quick ground, locking innocents within your sights.

As well as this, when you unlock the Spider, Werewolf and Vampire DLCs you will also gain access to an exclusive legendary melee weapon called the Wakizashi!

On top of that, the Spider pack includes an exclusive Spider Emblem, 3 loot booth tokens to help you get even more cosmetic gear for your character and 200 Credits to put towards your next item or use with the Reputation system to show appreciation to your favourite fellow players.

This pack contains:

name: Deceit - Spider Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to play on low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: With the Spider Expansion, you can prey on innocent victims as you transform into the exclusive Spider Terror form!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Romanian
*languages with full audio support
